elements.name: verify user is able to send the confirmation link

steps.name: user is navigated to the login page and a comfirmation message is shown
user opens the email and enter email'carepaperautomation@gmail.com' and click next and enter password'password@carepaper' and click next
user is navigated to inbox and opens the 'Reset password instructions' mail
user click on Rest Password button
user enter new password '11223344' and confirm new password'11223344'
